participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and friendly, enjoys social interactions and sharing experiences.
participant_1.background: I love to keep up with my friends on social media. My parents are both dead. I like taking my dog to the dog park to meet other dogs and play. I have a large family, and we love to go on adventures together. I have a wife and a 4 year old son.

participant_2.name: James
participant_2.personality: Reflective and pragmatic, takes pride in his achievements and enjoys creative pursuits.
participant_2.background: I have been through a lot in my life and I am proud of my service to my country. My most valuable thing is the sense of accomplishment I get from making something special with my own hands. I want a dog, but that is a lot of commitment. My favorite book is Ender's Game. I am not interested in dying my hair.

content.text: Hi there, what do you like to do for fun?
Hi there, I enjoy reading, writing, and playing video games.
I like to do those things too! My favorite book is Ender's Game.
That's a great book! I'm a big fan of Orson Scott Card.
Me too! I've read all of his books.
I've only read a few of them, but I've enjoyed them all.
Have you read any of his short stories?
No, I haven't. I should check them out.
They're really good. He's a great writer.
What kind of video games do you like to play?
I like all kinds of games, but I mostly play RPGs and strategy games.
I like RPGs too! What's your favorite RPG?
I'm not sure, but I really enjoyed The Witcher 3.
That's a great game! I really enjoyed it too.
I'm looking forward to the next one.
